definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[בּוֹטֶה]] Pr 12:18 one that babbleth (opp. [[לְשׁוֹן חֲכָמִים]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְבַטֵּא בִשְׁבוּעָה]] Le 5:4 speak rashly, unadvisedly; so [[וַיְבַטֵּא בִשְׂפָתָיו]] (of Moses) Ps 106:33; Inf. [[לְבַטֵּא בִשְׂפָתַיִם]] Le 5:4 (P).
